activities: Saba collects Personal Information such as names, addresses, telephone numbers, email addresses and birthdates. For example, if a User submits a webinar registration to us online, we will collect the User's e-mail address. Saba also collects Users' names, companies, industries, postal addresses, email addresses and/or phone numbers when they register to receive certain information from us and/or our Site. If a User uses Saba’s software or services, the User may be asked to input information into an individual profile. This profile may include the User's name, registrations, certifications, qualifications, collaboration sessions attended, employment information and/or other information.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All on-line personal data, generally collected through www.Saba.com, www2.saba.com and/or other Saba-provisioned environments
privacyprograms: TRUSTe US-EU Safe Harbor Privacy Program
recoursemech: TRUSTe US-EU Safe Harbor Privacy Program is providing Saba's independent recourse mechanism/third party dispute resolution mechanism.
